name: JZT
description: A DOS-era Adventure Game for the Web

scripts.build:js: npm run build:game:js && npm run build:editor:js
scripts.build:js:production: npm run build:game:js:production && npm run build:editor:js:production
scripts.build:editor:js: browserify -d src/ux/ux-editor.js -s jztEditor > build/jzt-editor.min.js && browserify -d src/ux/ux-editor-play.js -s jztPlayer > build/jzt-editor-play.min.js
scripts.build:editor:js:production: browserify -d src/ux/ux-editor.js -s jztEditor | uglifyjs -c -m > build/jzt-editor.min.js && browserify -d src/ux/ux-editor-play.js -s jztPlayer | uglifyjs -c -m > build/jzt-editor-play.min.js
